name: Chris Mangum
title: Front End Engineer
about:
I am a developer, problem-solver, and a thinker. I love throwing out old paradigms for better, more efficient ones.

I've been lucky to work on large / complex projects in the past as well as working with other very talented developers. I'm most proud of several personal side-projects I've done in collaboration with friends, and the work I'm doing here at Smashing Boxes.

My interests include functional programming, GNU/Linux, video games, bass guitar, and music.
